skins.shipDescription: Portland-class Heavy Cruiser C Indianapolis, Hull Number CA-35!
skins.selfIntroduction: ... I'm Indianapolis, second ship of the Portland-class. I apologize for any trouble my big sister caused... A nuclear bomb? I'm not sure what that is.
skins.acquisition: Yeah? ... Commander, I'm Indianapolis. My nickname is Indy. Hm? A nuclear bomb? What's that?
skins.login: ...?! When did you get here, Commander? You startled me...
skins.details: What are you looking at? My skin color has always been light brown, it's not a tan.
skins.secretaryIdle1: If I go away, I guess you'll have to rely on New Mexico.
skins.secretaryIdle2: I wonder why my sister's always looking at me...
skins.secretaryIdle3: To be honest... I can't really have a proper conversation with other people...

skins.CNClientName: 与姐姐一起的校园生活？
skins.shipDescription: School life... It's nice as long as you and my sister are here... I think...
skins.acquisition: School life... It's nice as long as you and my sister are here... I think...
skins.login: Oh, Commander... If my sister asks, could you tell her I'm not going? Please, it would help...
skins.details: What are you looking at, Commander? ... It looks good on me? Sounds like what my sister would say...
skins.secretaryIdle1: My sister makes great lunch boxes... but she doesn't need to write "I Love Indy" on them every single time...
skins.secretaryIdle2: I like this plushie Portland gave me... But something about it feels off...
skins.secretaryIdle3: I'm definitely better at science than languages... How do I get better at expressing my feelings?
skins.secretaryTouch: ... What? I'm not sleeping. Haven't I told you that I just have a slower reaction time than others?
skins.secretaryHeadpat: Is this... my reward for behaving?

skins.shipDescription: Oh. Good evening, Commander. Do you want some steak? It goes great with wine.
